COT Teen\'s Text Messages Fetch Texts 375757255707-hao3bt67vuk0nipjcufoj11r4o67e19t.apps.googleusercontent.com NEXT Welcome to the Parent\'s Dashboard This app will allow you to monitor your teen\’s text messaging activity. Let\'s Get Started Please sign-in using your google account Add Teen Pair With Teen Device Enter this code in your Teen\'s app to pair MainActivity2 Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Settingss MMS Content Uninstalled Installed edu.ucf.parentdashboard.ch1 Enter your Teen\'s first name: Once your Teen\'s texts are processed, you will be able to choose the initial Circle of Trust. Text processing may take a while if there are a lot of messages. Texts received by Teen Texts sent by Teen AnalysisActivity Details Summary Videos View Teen\'s Texts View Teen\'s Apps
Welcome to CD9 Dummy Button DUMMY\nCONTENT
Choose whose device is being used. Welcome to The Teen Companion App This app will allow your parent to monitor your text messages. Let\'s Get Started In order for this app to work properly, we will need you to grant the app permission to monitor your phone. After clicking “Next,” please select “Allow” when prompted. Let\'s Get Started Enter the code given to you by your parent. Please grant permission to register this device for text monitoring. Read Phone State permission must be granted. Exiting… Activating Device Administrator is critical for the functioning of Parental Control Text Monitoring App. It ensures that the monitoring runs uninterrupted. Parental Monitoring Required service for Parental Control Hold on, we are finishing setup... Setup may take a while, so please be patient and don’t close the app until it is finished Sentiment Analysis for Text Messages Positive Negative Mixed Neutral Texts received by you Texts sent by you No images have any risk flags. Word Cloud for Images Sent/Received Finishing...
A Brief Tutorial on CoT Your parent is choosing the initial Circle of Trust. While waiting, here is some helpful information about the application. Trusted and Untrusted Contacts Trusted Trusted Contacts: if a contact is "Trusted", texts will not be explicitly displayed rather a sentiment analysis of each message will be provided. (Warning: Even if a contact is "Trusted", flagged content WILL be displayed explicitly to the Parent!) Untrusted Contacts: if a contact is not "Trusted", all texts and media exchanged WILL be explicitly displayed to the Parent. Pending: a contact has been requested to be placed or removed from the Circle of Trust Parent or Teen may request or deny a contact to be added or removed from the Circle.
We recommend not adding these contacts to the Circle of Trust. \n
Select a contact below to override. We recommend adding these contacts to the Circle of Trust. \n
Select a contact below to override.
